title: 97x16: Post-Employment Restrictions; Senior Employees; 18 U.S.C. § 207(c)
summary: OGE did not create an exception to 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) for a new director position within an agency because that agency did not provide sufficient evidence to show that the imposition of section 207(c) would cause undue hardship within the meaning of section 207(c)(2)(C)(i).
